Token.Abstract:
The type of action for an item update operation. Only use the add action for numbers or sets; the specified value is added to the existing value. If a set of values is specified, the values are added to the existing set. Adds the specified attribute. If the attribute exists, it is replaced by the new value. If no value is specified, this removes the attribute and its value. If a set of values is specified, then the values in the specified set are removed from the old set.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: ADD, PUT, DELETE

If no value is specified, this removes the attribute and its value. If a set of values is specified, then the values in the specified set are removed from the old set.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: ADD, PUT, DELETE
Default constructor for a new AttributeValueUpdate object. Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.
Constructs a new AttributeValueUpdate object. Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameter.Name: theAction
Parameter.Abstract: The type of action for an item update operation. Only use the add action for numbers or sets; the specified value is added to the existing value. If a set of values is specified, the values are added to the existing set. Adds the specified attribute. If the attribute exists, it is replaced by the new value. If no value is specified, this removes the attribute and its value. If a set of values is specified, then the values in the specified set are removed from the old set.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of this object.
